targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  e."name" as "VM Name",
  a.description as "Description"
FROM completed_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
where
$__timeFilter(a.completion_time) AND
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
(a.description like '%VCPU%' OR a.description like '%VMem%') AND
a.final_state = 'SUCCEEDED'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  e."name" as "VM Name",
  (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float as "Difference",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM completed_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
where
$__timeFilter(a.completion_time) AND
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
a.description like '%VCPU%' AND
a.final_state = 'SUCCEEDED'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  e."name" as "VM Name",
  (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'from')::float as "Difference",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM completed_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
where
$__timeFilter(a.completion_time) AND
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
a.description like '%VMem%' AND
a.final_state = 'SUCCEEDED'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  e."name" as "VM Name",
  ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float)*${VCPU_COST} as "Cost",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM completed_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
where
$__timeFilter(a.completion_time) AND
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
a.description like '%VCPU%' AND
a.final_state = 'SUCCEEDED'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  e."name" as "VM Name",
  ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'from')::float)*${VMEM_COST}/1024/1024 as "Cost",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM completed_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
where
$__timeFilter(a.completion_time) AND
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
a.description like '%VMem%' AND
a.final_state = 'SUCCEEDED'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  e."name" as "VM Name",
  a.description as "Description"
FROM completed_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${CLUSTER_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
$__timeFilter(a.completion_time) AND
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
(a.description like '%VCPU%' OR a.description like '%VMem%') AND
a.final_state = 'SUCCEEDED' AND a.category = 'EFFICIENCY_IMPROVEMENT'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

FROM completed_action a

  e."name" as "VM Name",
  (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float as "Difference",

  (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'from')::float as "Difference",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM completed_action a

where
$__timeFilter(a.completion_time) AND

e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND

SELECT

  ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float)*${VCPU_COST} as "Cost",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM completed_action a

SELECT
  e."name" as "VM Name",
  ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'from')::float)*${VMEM_COST}/1000/1000 as "Cost",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM completed_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${CLUSTER_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
$__timeFilter(a.completion_time) AND
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
a.description like '%VMem%' AND

SELECT
  e."name" as "VM Name",
  ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float)*${VCPU_COST} as "Cost",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM completed_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${CLUSTER_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
$__timeFilter(a.completion_time) AND
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
a.description like '%VCPU%' AND
a.final_state = 'SUCCEEDED' AND a.category = 'PERFORMANCE_ASSURANCE'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  e."name" as "VM Name",
  ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'from')::float)*${VMEM_COST}/1000/1000 as "Cost",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM completed_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${CLUSTER_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
$__timeFilter(a.completion_time) AND
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
a.description like '%VMem%' AND
a.final_state = 'SUCCEEDED' AND a.category = 'PERFORMANCE_ASSURANCE'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT 
  a.completion_time as "Completion Time",
  e."name" as "VM Name",
  a.final_state,
  a.category,
--  a.completion_time,
  CASE WHEN a.description like '%VCPU%'
    THEN 'VCPU'
    ELSE 'VMEM'
    END as "Resource",
  CASE WHEN ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float) > 0 OR ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'from')::float) > 0
    THEN 1::integer
    ELSE -1::integer
    END as "Direction",
    CASE WHEN a.description like '%VCPU%'
    THEN (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float
    ELSE (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'from')::float
    END as "from",
    CASE WHEN a.description like '%VCPU%'
    THEN (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float
    ELSE (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'to')::float
    END as "to",
  CASE WHEN a.description like '%VCPU%'
    THEN (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float
    ELSE (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'from')::float
    END as "Difference",
  CASE WHEN a.description like '%VCPU%'
    THEN a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'unit'
    ELSE a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'unit'
    END as "Unit"
FROM completed_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${CLUSTER_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
$__timeFilter(a.completion_time) AND
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' 
ORDER BY "VM Name"

list.definition:
select name from entity e
where "type" = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
order by name
list.label: Cluster
list.name: CLUSTER_NAME
list.query:
select name from entity e
where "type" = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
order by name

list.definition:
select oid from entity e
where "type" = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
and name IN (${CLUSTER_NAME:sqlstring})
order by name
list.label: Cluster OID
list.name: CLUSTER_OID
list.query:
select oid from entity e
where "type" = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
and name IN (${CLUSTER_NAME:sqlstring})
order by name

title: On-Prem: Completed Resize Actions Summary - with Costs
